text: Polina Rasina (; born 12 March 1999) is a Bulgarian footballer who plays as a forward for the Bulgaria women's national team. ==International career== Rasina capped for Bulgaria at senior level in a 0–6 friendly loss to Croatia on 14 June 2019. ==References== Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football forwards Category:Bulgarian women's footballers Category:Bulgaria women's international footballers
title: Polina Rasina
